articles.title: Novo Nordisk shares plunge after CagriSema obesity drug trial disappoints - Reuters
articles.description: Novo Nordisk on Friday revealed disappointing results in a late-stage trial for its experimental next-generation obesity drug CagriSema, wiping as much as $125 billion off its market value.

articles.title: Pupil killed in knife attack at Croatia school - Reuters
articles.description: A seven-year-old child was killed by a knife-wielding assailant who attacked a teacher and pupils at a Zagreb primary school on Friday, government ministers said.
